Arcangel/Silverbolt/Blade Runner




Arcangel extended his blades and started to fire firebolts at the bat 
probes.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Silverbolt



he pulled out two missles and threw them at the mole bot.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Blade Runner


he felt fully awake and he heard fighting going on. so he blew the hatch off 
of the stasis pod. even know he was a bunch of mutated animals he was 
looking great. he turned on his jet pack flew up to Arcangel.


Blade Runner:



"leave this one alone I will take care of him."
